nodes.text: Platform 327 was a landing platform in Cloud City on Bespin. The Millennium Falcon parked there after the Battle of Hoth when its crew, the friends of Luke Skywalker, were fleeing Darth Vader's pursuit and sought refuge with Lando Calrissian. However, Boba Fett had intercepted the Falcon and Vader arrived ahead, ordering his men to deactivate the ship's hyperdrive during its maintenance.
